content.body: Too bad we couldn't get into the custom elements callback for moveBefore(). I kinda feel like it deserves a new callback, but maybe smaug would argue for a flag there too? (I feel the same way about the specification callback.)
content.formatted_body: Too bad we couldn't get into the custom elements callback for moveBefore(). I kinda feel like it deserves a new callback, but maybe smaug would argue for a flag there too? (I feel the same way about the specification callback.)

content.body:
> <@annevk:matrix.org> Too bad we couldn't get into the custom elements callback for moveBefore(). I kinda feel like it deserves a new callback, but maybe smaug would argue for a flag there too? (I feel the same way about the specification callback.)

In short: thinking to have `movedCallback` that has a default implementation of calling `disconnectedCallback(); connectedCallback()`
